remarks: A separable metric space (a metric space with a countable dense subset) is second-countable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2015.)
statement:
methaus.1 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
met2ndci $p |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ ( A C_ X /\ A ~<_ _om /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) = X ) ) -> J e. 2ndc ) $.
